column1: It is true. You are a good <PRO_MANWOMAN>, <CHARNAME>, and your stance against evil is without question. Your fight against the taint of our evil father is worthy of praise.
column2: Es verdad. Sois una buena mujer, <CHARNAME>, y vuestra postura contra el mal está fuera de toda duda. Vuestra lucha contra la deshonra de nuestro malvado padre es digna de elogio.

column1: I would expect no other response from a true <PRO_BROTHERSISTER> of mine. I know too well the thirst for death that comes with the taint of our sire. I have mastered it, but only barely... I pity those who are a slave to it.
column2: No esperaría otra cosa de una verdadera hermana mío. Conozco demasiado bien la sed de muerte que conlleva la mancha de nuestro padre. La he dominado, pero a duras penas... Compadezco a los que son esclavos de ella.

column1: Very well, then, <CHARNAME>. I will join you. You are a worthy <PRO_MANWOMAN>. Perhaps even worthy of turning Bhaal's dark taint and making something better of it. I do not know. But I will take that chance.
column2: Muy bien, <CHARNAME>. Me uniré a vos. Sois una mujer digna. Quizás incluso digna de convertir la lacra oscura de Bhaal en algo mejor. No lo sé. Pero correré el riesgo.

column1: I am your <PRO_BROTHERSISTER>, Balthazar. Let us fight what is inevitable! We can work together!
column2: Soy vuestra hermana, Balthazar. ¡Luchemos contra lo inevitable! ¡Podemos trabajar juntos!

column1: But perhaps I have resigned myself to a path that is not what it seems. You are... hardly what I expected for the last of the Bhaalspawn, <CHARNAME>. Perhaps there is hope... or perhaps I am only deluding myself.
column2: Pero quizás me he resignado a un camino que no es lo que parece. Vos... no sois lo que esperaba como la última de los Engendros de Bhaal, <CHARNAME>.  Tal vez haya esperanza... o tal vez sólo me esté engañando a mi mismo.
